mapper.select: select betId, state, title, content, photoA , photoB , betWay , startDate ,endDate , openCheck , pointCheck , point, aVote, bVote, betOwner FROM bet_tb WHERE betWay =#{betWay} and state = '진행' or state = '종료'

choose.when: insert into bet_tb (betId, state, title, content, photoA , photoB , betWay , startDate ,endDate , openCheck , pointCheck , point, aVote, bVote, betOwner ) values(#{betId}, #{state}, #{title}, #{content}, null, #{photoB} , #{betWay}, SYSDATE, #{endDate}, #{openCheck}, #{pointCheck}, #{point}, 0, 0, #{betOwner})

insert into bet_tb (betId, state, title, content, photoA , photoB , betWay , startDate ,endDate , openCheck , pointCheck , point, aVote, bVote, betOwner ) values(#{betId}, #{state}, #{title}, #{content}, #{photoA}, NUll , #{betWay}, SYSDATE, #{endDate}, #{openCheck}, #{pointCheck}, #{point}, 0, 0, #{betOwner})

insert into bet_tb (betId, state, title, content, photoA , photoB , betWay , startDate ,endDate , openCheck , pointCheck , point, aVote, bVote ,betOwner) values(#{betId}, #{state}, #{title}, #{content}, null, null , #{betWay}, SYSDATE, #{endDate}, #{openCheck}, #{pointCheck}, #{point}, 0, 0, #{betOwner})
choose.otherwise: insert into bet_tb (betId, state, title, content, photoA , photoB , betWay , startDate ,endDate , openCheck , pointCheck , point, aVote, bVote ,betOwner) values(#{betId}, #{state}, #{title}, #{content}, #{photoA}, #{photoB}, #{betWay}, SYSDATE, #{endDate}, #{openCheck}, #{pointCheck}, #{point}, 0, 0, #{betOwner})
